Meaning of Manu. Means thinking, wise or intelligent in Sanskrit. In Hinduism, Manu is a title accorded to the progenitor of mankind, first king to rule this earth, who saved mankind from the universal flood. He is honest that is why he is called Satyavrata, or oath of truth. intelligent; the first man. intelligent; the first man.
